title: 1989 Ford F700 20’ Box Truck With 2500Lb Lift Gate (Not Running)
item_description:
1989 Ford F700 20’ Box Truck With 2500Lb Lift Gate (Not Running)

Specifications

  • Year: 1989
  • Make: Ford
  • Model: F700
  • VIN: 1FDNF70K6KVA01556
  • License: 7B80278
    • Registration Expiration: 10/31/2006
  • Odometer Reads: 140137
  • Key: Available
  • GVWR: 24500
  • Engine: 7.0L V8
  • Body Style: Box Truck
  • Fuel Type: Gasoline
  • Transmission: Automatic
  • Tire Size: 9.00R20 12PR
  • Deck Length: 20’
  • Deck Width: 91” Inside
  • Wall Height: 90” Inside

Exterior

  • Exterior Color: Yellow
  • Doors: Two Door

Interior

  • Interior Material: Vinyl
  • Interior Color: Black

Note: Application for Replacement Title or Certificate of Title, and Transfer Form, will be mailed 2-3 weeks after removal. Seller states that this vehicle has not ran in 5+ years and used it mainly for storage on the property. The Seller is selling this vehicle "as-is" in need of repair, without smog, the buyer agrees to repair and smog the vehicle and sign an "as-is" bill of sale. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of repairs, smog, registration, inspections, transfer, taxes, and fees due to the DMV. Sale pending DMV from Seller.
